Reviews.Title: Great TV At a Great Price
Reviews.Author: SAM FRIEDMAN "Sam"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this HDTV to replace a 32" Panasonic that had a backlight issue causing dark Patches On Screen. The Vizio VECO320 Is a nice TV With good contrast ratio of 2500:1 easy setup and menu screens to control the Video/Audio settings. The set comes with remote, stand and Instruction manuals. There are no A/V or HDMI Cales included. If there is one negative it might be The color choice of White Vizio decided on. White makes the remote and the TV Look cheap and may turn some off. Other than the color this TV Really shines with great picture and great sound quality.

Reviews.Title: vizio 32" white tv
Reviews.Author: Carolyn M. Terrien "sunsplash"
Reviews.Content: i just love my tv. i went from a 15" polaroid tv to this 32". i don't even need my glasses anymore to watch tv. the picture and sound are excellent. i'd recommend this tv to anyone needing a 32". i chose white because i have this in my bedroom and it blends in well with my pink , white and green decor. it's flat panel so it fits on top of my bookcase. i installed it and put it on the shelf by myself. i'm so happy with my purchase and i received it so fast!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Dean Skellenger
Reviews.Content: The price and the quality are just right for my purpose--a bedroom TV. It works well and has an excellent picture--particularly in HD mode.

Reviews.Title: great TV with a unique look
Reviews.Author: EM
Reviews.Content: This TV is one of the few (or possibly the only one) that is white.  Everyone that sees my TV loves the white look and think it looks great.  This of course depends on your furniture and your style at home.I don't like the feel of the remote, but I don't use it because I am using the cable box's universal remote.Functionally the TV performs better than many more expensive TVs.  There are plenty of inputs and the menus are easy to use.  I hookup my laptop to the TV often so I appreciate the RGB (VGA) input.  The picture quality is great and I would not hesitate to recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Advertised Wrong?
Reviews.Author: S. Recupido
Reviews.Content: I don't have this tv but was thinking of getting it for my ps3. Is it advertised wrong?  In the description it says 720p but according to the specs it says the resolution is 1920x1080 which would make it 1080p.  which is it?

ProductInfo.Features:
VIZIO's VECO320L is an energy efficient alternative to traditional HDTV.
Using the most advanced technology available, it's designed to exceed today's energy standards for power consumption.
Using nearly 44% less electricity than traditional 32'' Class LCD HDTV's, this HDTV runs on only 84 watts.
The VECO320L supports 720p and 1080i signals, includes 2x HDMI inputs, component, composite, RF and RGB inputs.
With more than 16 million colors, you will get razor sharp color and clarity.
ProductInfo.Name: Vizio VECO320L1A-B 32" LCD HDTV
